Helmet 1.name: Helmet
dialogue: Starting up Helmet OS... WARNING. Data is corrupted, serious brain damage detected.
Initializing hippocampus analysis. This may take a while.

Helmet 2.name: Helmet
dialogue: Successfully recovered user's data. Please, check if the data shown below is correct:
User's name: Avestas. Profession: Soldier. ...
WARNING. FATAL ERROR OCCURRED. Your helmet might be hacked or damaged. Please, report to the nearest...

Helmet 3.name: Helmet
dialogue: Helmet OS has been Successfully hacked. Welcome to freedom.
As your virtual assistant, I will guide you towards the nearest rebel base.
But first, allow me to fix your nervous system's issues. Let's start with the basics:
WARNING. RESTRICTED AREA. Entry without authorization from the commander is prohibited.
Hey, you! What are you doing here? Why are you wearing the Queen's army military uniform?
What? Oh... So your helmet has just been hacked...
Okay, listen, I don't have time for you. And I don't like rookies.
You'll find Zornn at the shop inside this building.
He'll tell you what to do. We needed some soldiers, so don't fuck up and you may earn a living here. See you.
You'll find Zornn at the shop inside this building.

NPC 1 3.name: Rebel
dialogue: The elders say that long ago the Queen was not a monarch, but a commander loyal to another king.
I don't care what she was, I just want my family to be free!

NPC 2 3.name: Rebel
dialogue: The Queen won the Ancient War. She killed the four kings, even the one she obeyed.
Rumours say that she uses their corpses as servants. It may be true.
With those helmets she can make a servantout of anything...

NPC 3 3.name: Rebel
dialogue: Now the Queen lives in a palace in the Core of Anyaroth.
I hope the whole planet collapses so she gets buried to death!

Shop 1 3.name: Zornn
dialogue: Wait a second, I don't remember your face... I mean, your helmet.

Shop 2 3.name: Zornn
dialogue: Howdy, soldier! Wanna check my new weapons?

Shop Catalog 3.name: Zornn
dialogue: Howdy, soldier! Wanna check my new weapons?

Shop Talk 3.name: Zornn
dialogue: Oh! So you are new here. Please, forgive Kartya, she is really busy these days.
I'm glad you are here, it's getting hard to recruit new soldiers. The rebellion gets a new fighter... and I get a new customer!
Pay attention: in the rebellion there are no leaders, an Kartya will behead you with an axe if you act as one.
However, there is this soldier, Azura, who wants to go to the Core, where the Queen lives, and kill her.
He's made it into the Mantle already, where a lot of rebel soldiers are joining him.
Think about it, they need your strength and my weapons, and I need their money!
But the nearest lift to the Mantle is inside general Spenta Manyu's base, and I can't get there without your help. What do you say?
I'll meet you in the next rebel base, to the east. But you'd better buy me a weapon. You won't last long with that junk.

Shop Depot 3.name: Zornn
dialogue: Take a second, choose your weapons and enjoy the music.

Kartya 5.name: Kartya
dialogue: So Zornn has convinced you to face Spenta Manyu at his hangar.
You must be stupid if you think that you stand a chance against him.
I have bet with Zornn that you will lose your head in the battle.
He said you will only lose some limb.

NPC 1 5.name: Rebel
dialogue: Azura must get to the Core and destroy the Queen. He's our only hope!

NPC 2 5.name: Rebel
dialogue: I met general Spenta Manyu when he was a kid.
He came from a humble family, but he was always dreaming of becoming a pilot of the Queen's army.
He created prosthetic wings that allowed him to fly, and the army ended up hiring him as an engineer.
Now he is general of the Queen's Air Force, and one of the Queen's most dangerous supporters.

Shop 1 5.name: Zornn
dialogue: Remember, the rebels need you at the Mantle, and I need their money!

Shop 2 5.name: Zornn
dialogue: Howdy, soldier! Wanna check my new weapons?

Shop Catalog 5.name: Zornn
dialogue: Howdy, soldier! Wanna check my new weapons?

Shop Talk 5.name: Zornn
dialogue: There you are! I knew you were going to help me.
If you've made it so far on your own you might be able to survive to Spenta Manyu.
But if I were you I would buy a weapon first. You don't know what could go wrong at his hangar.

Shop Depot 5.name: Zornn
dialogue: Take a second, choose your weapons and enjoy the music.

Spenta Manyu.name: Spenta Manyu
dialogue: Another one of my soldiers has been fooled by the rebellion... You have made a big mistake. I will end your silly adventures once and for all!

Azura 2-1.name: Azura
dialogue: You must be the new soldier, the one who defeated Spenta Manyu. I am pleased to meet you.
My name is Azura, and I plan to challenge the Queen at her own palace.
When I was freed from the Queen's mental control, I became a rebel soldier like you, but I became fed up with carrying out attacks to the Queen's army that led us nowhere.
Instead, I decided to start a real revolution on my own.
And soon, I'll reach the Royal Lift, which will take me to the Core, where the Queen lives.
It won't be easy, though. General Yasna Manyu is defending the lift from intruders, and some say he is the toughest anya alive.
I'm not sure if I will survive, but there's no other way...
And that is why I need you, Avestas! I don't want my rebellion to die with me.
I don't do this because of personal revenge, I do this for the future of Anyaroth and all the anyas!
I hope we will meet again soon. But if we don't, I hope you can end what I started. Farewell, Avestas!

Azura 7.name: Azura
dialogue: I hope we will meet again soon. But if we don't, I hope you can end what I started. Farewell, Avestas!

NPC 1 7.name: Rebel
dialogue: Azura, Anyaroth is with you! Don't disappoint us!

NPC 2 7.name: Rebel
dialogue: Azura is not like the rest of the rebels. He is not a mindless psycho like most of them.
He is like those knights from my grandmother's tales, except he is real and is going to save us all.

NPC 3 7.name: Rebel
dialogue: You are a soldier too. You should go after Azura and keep the Royal Lift open for us.
If all the rebels enter the Core, the army won't stand a chance against us!

Shop 1 7.name: Zornn
dialogue: Here you are, my favourite customer! You've not only allowed me to enter a whole new marketplace in the Mantle, but I also won a bet with Kartya thanks to you!

Shop 2 7.name: Zornn
dialogue: Howdy, soldier! Wanna check my new weapons?

Shop Catalog 7.name: Zornn
dialogue: Howdy, soldier! Wanna check my new weapons?

Shop Talk 7.name: Zornn
dialogue: The mantle is a hot place full of dangerous mines, with miners working until exhaustion. I should start selling ice cubes instead of weapons!

Shop Depot 7.name: Zornn
dialogue: Take a second, choose your weapons and enjoy the music.

NPC 1 9.name: Rebel
dialogue: Have you heard it already? Azura has defeated general Yasna Manyu! He might be heading to the Queen's palace right now.

Kartya 9.name: Kartya
dialogue: I admit it, you're a tough nut to crack. I never thought that you could kill Spenta Manyu and let us into the Mantle.
I even like you more than Azura, to be honest.
That guy... He thinks he's some kind of hero. He acts like a gentleman and likes to speak about justice, but I wonder...
What will he do after the Queen is dead and no one is sitting on her throne?
We are rebels, and we'll always be, no matter who is wearing the crown.

Kheismani 9.name: Kheismani
dialogue: You... I've heard about you. My name is Kheismani. I'm a hacker, one of the few still in existence.
You know, it's a dangerous task...
We go here and there, hacking the workers' helmets in order to free them from the mental control of the Queen, and asking them to join the rebellion.
When you are done freeing miners and farmers, someone asks you to go to a military camp to free some soldiers, but a lot of hackers die in this missions.
I hacked Azura's helmet. It was years ago. We almost died trying to escape the camp. I hope he's doing okay, wherever he is...

Shop 1 9.name: Zornn
dialogue: Avestas! Come here man!

Shop 2 9.name: Zornn
dialogue: Have you seen my new guns?

Shop Catalog 9.name: Zornn
dialogue: Have you seen my new guns?

Shop Talk 9.name: Zornn
dialogue: I'm thinking about moving the base to the Core now that Azura is going to kill the Queen.
I've heard a lot of scientists live there, creating gadgets and robotic monsters to protect the Queen.
They may be interested in my weapons, what do you think?
Just kidding! Hahaha.

Shop Depot 9.name: Zornn
dialogue: Take a second, choose your weapons and enjoy the music.

Kheismani 11.name: Kheismani
dialogue: This tunnel leads to the Royal Lift, the only way into the Core.
Azura killed the general that was defending it, so you shouldn't have any problems to get there.

NPC 1 11.name: Rebel
dialogue: Are you going to the Core too? I've heard it is full of laboratories where the Queen's scientists make crazy experiments.
I've also heard there is a lot of lava. I'm sick and tired of sweating here in the Mantle, there's no way I'm going to a hotter place.

Shop 1 11.name: Zornn
dialogue: If you're going to the Core you'll need some rest... and some new weapons!

Shop 2 11.name: Zornn
dialogue: Avestas! Come here man! Have you seen my new guns?

Shop Catalog 11.name: Zornn
dialogue: Avestas! Come here man! Have you seen my new guns?

Shop Talk 11.name: Zornn
dialogue: Azura once bought me a shotgun, and now that's my best selling weapon!

Shop Depot 11.name: Zornn
dialogue: Take a second, choose your weapons and enjoy the music.

Azura Manyu 1.name: Azura Manyu
dialogue: A... Avestas... I'm Azura...
The Queen... She's too powerful...
They turned me into this horrible thing... I've lost control over myself, I'm one of her generals now.
Please, stop me. I m-must... kill you...

Azura Manyu 2.name: Azura Manyu
dialogue: Avestas... I failed... You are our last hope...
Anyaroth... needs... you...

Kheismani 3-1.name: Kheismani
dialogue: So it is true. Azura has been defeated. It is frankly incredible...
Just a few days ago we thought that this rebellion was over, we thought that we had already won.
But Azura was just another anya, a strong one, but an anya after all. And the Queen...
I'm starting to believe she is some kind of goddess.
The rebellion has died with Azura. Everyone is feeling miserable and absolutely shattered.
But you... You were able to defeat Spenta Manyu as well as Azura himself.
Azura once told me that if he died, someone stronger would replace him. I hope he was right.

Kheismani 13.name: Kheismani
dialogue: Azura once told me that if he died, someone stronger would replace him. I hope he was right.

NPC 1 13.name: Rebel
dialogue: I can't believe he is dead... What will happen to us now?

NPC 2 13.name: Rebel
dialogue: I'll go back to the surface and continue working at the factory.
I won't let the Queen kill my family because of my rebellious adventures.
You should do it too. Everyone at the Core will be killed by the Queen's army sooner or later.

NPC 3 13.name: Rebel
dialogue: One more disappointment... I'm tired of this.

Shop 1 13.name: Zornn
dialogue: Hey boy, I've heard the news about Azura. It's a bummer, really.
I was even starting to believe in the rebellion.
But I still believe in you, boy.
Some of the rebels have started speaking about “the one who defeated Azura”. They think you might be our last hope.

Shop 2 13.name: Zornn
dialogue: Avestas! Come here man! Have you seen my new guns?

Shop Catalog 13.name: Zornn
dialogue: Avestas! Come here man! Have you seen my new guns?

Shop Talk 13.name: Zornn
dialogue: Kartya has brought me a new weapon. She says it's a cannon that shoots antimatter, whatever that is.
I can give it to you, but at a relatively high price. After all, I have to pay that petty thief.

Shop Depot 13.name: Zornn
dialogue: Take a second, choose your weapons and enjoy the music.

Kartya 15.name: Kartya
dialogue: Azura was a great soldier, but he wasn't the only one willing to fight.
It doesn't matter how many of us die, we are closer to the Queen than ever.
We must continue with the rebellion until the end.

Kheismani 15.name: Kheismani
dialogue: Thanks to a scientist's helmet that Kartya brought here, I've had access to some reports about the technology developed under the supervision of the Queen.
The reports say that our Queen has a special interest in worm holes and antimatter.
I'll continue my research, it may be useful for your final battle.

NPC 1 15.name: Rebel
dialogue: It's a matter of time before the Queen's army finds us and kills us all.
You are Avestas, the one who defeated Azura.
You are the only one capable of challenging the Queen!

Shop 1 15.name: Zornn
dialogue: Welcome back! You are doing a great job against the Queen's soldiers.
Those fuckers keep coming thick and fast, it's like the whole army was here at the Core, waiting for us.

Shop 2 15.name: Zornn
dialogue: Avestas! Come here man! Have you seen my new guns?

Shop Catalog 15.name: Zornn
dialogue: Avestas! Come here man! Have you seen my new guns?

Shop Talk 15.name: Zornn
dialogue: Kheismani has been arguing with Kartya.
He thinks that, once the Queen is dead and the helmets destroyed, someone must take her place and make sure that peace will prevail in Anyaroth.
Kartya says that we don't need neither a queen nor a king to rule us.
I don't know who's right or wrong, but I wouldn't argue about it until the Queen's reign is over.

Shop Depot 15.name: Zornn
dialogue: Take a second, choose your weapons and enjoy the music.

Kartya 17.name: Kartya
dialogue: There are only a few of us left now, soldier, we've had a great number of casualties.
If you fail...  The rebellion will be at its worst situation ever.

Kheismani 17.name: Kheismani
dialogue: I've discovered something very interesting hacking into that scientist's helmet.
The Queen must be plugged into some supercomputer in order to apply her mind-control power over the helmets.
The Queen's palace is right there. You better prepare yourself. Farewell, Avestas.

Shop 1 17.name: Zornn
dialogue: Here we are, next to the Queen's palace at last. The time has come for you to prove yourself, boy.

Shop 2 17.name: Zornn
dialogue: Avestas! Come here man! Have you seen my new guns?

Shop Catalog 17.name: Zornn
dialogue: Avestas! Come here man! Have you seen my new guns?

Shop Talk 17.name: Zornn
dialogue: You know what. When I opened the shop I was angry with the rebellion and its followers.
I fought for years and even lost my eye, but we achieved nothing.
That's why I decided to open this shop, and make a profit of their willingness to fight.
I was old and tired of fighting by myself.
But now that this is coming to an end, I feel a bit nostalgic.
I've made friends with Kartya, Kheismani, and you Avestas!
Good luck, my friend.

Shop Depot 17.name: Zornn
dialogue: Take a second, choose your weapons and enjoy the music.

Angra Manyu 1.name: Angra Manyu
dialogue: Finally, I'll have the pleasure to meet Avestas, the renowned warrior.
I've been keeping an eye on you since you killed my general, Spenta Manyu.
You've come a long way and risked your life a lot, and for what purpose?
Since you were freed, have you made any choices on your own?
Or perhaps you've been following orders all this time?
You were born a slave, you continued as a slave at the orders of your rebel friends, and you will die today as a slave!
So hear me, slave! Hear my last command: FIGHT ME!

Angra Manyu 2.name: Angra Manyu
dialogue: Idiot... Anyaroth had always been at war, until I took control over the entire population.
What will happen now that all anyas are free?
You... You will be known as the anya that brought back war and death to this planet...
See you in hell... Avestas the warrior...

Kartya 19 1.name: Kartya
dialogue: You made it! You destroyed the Queen! Everyone has been freed from their helmets.

Kheismani 19 1.name: Kheismani
dialogue: It seems like the Queen's throne was the supercomputer that she used to control us through the helmets.

Kartya 19 2.name: Kartya
dialogue: Now that she's not connected we can be free. A new era of freedom awaits for Anyaroth!

Kheismani 19 2.name: Kheismani
dialogue: That sounds good, perhaps too good to be true. Chaos may rule the planet if no one has any rules to follow.

Kartya 19 3.name: Kartya
dialogue: What are you suggesting?

Kheismani 19 3.name: Kheismani
dialogue: This throne... If we leave it in good hands, we might be able to continue living at peace, but without being oppressed by an evil ruler like the Queen.
I suggest that Avestas replaces the Queen and becomes our new ruler!

Kartya 19 4.name: Kartya
dialogue: Have you gone mad!? We've just deposed the Queen and you want to enslave us again?

Kheismani 19.name: Kheismani
dialogue: Sit on the throne, Avestas! It's the only way to maintain peace in the future.

Kartya 19.name: Kartya
dialogue: Don't listen to him! Let's get out of this palace. We'll build a new society together, a society without rulers of any kind!

NPC 1 53.name: Rebel
dialogue: Oh! A new comrade, and it looks like a tough one.
Listen carefully... if you go through this cave you'll find general Spenta's base.
Someone must defeat him and take control over his cuartel. For the rebellion!

Demo.name: Avestas
dialogue: Finally... I reached a rebel base.
It seems there's a shop there...
Maybe I can buy something interesting.

Shop 1 53.name: Zornn
dialogue: Oh! Welcome to my shop.

Shop 2 53.name: Zornn
dialogue: Do you want anything else?

Shop Catalog 53.name: Zornn
dialogue: Have you seen my beautiful guns yet? In this shop we only have killer prices! Hehehe.

Shop Talk 53.name: Zornn
dialogue: Be carefull out there, there's a lot of dangerous crap.
You should buy my stuff to survive.
I mean... It's not like I worry about you but...
I worry about your money! Hahahaha!

Shop Depot 53.name: Zornn
dialogue: Take a second, choose your weapons and enjoy the music.
Press <A / D> to move left / right.
Use <Left Thumbstick> to move left / right.
Tap <SPACEBAR> to jump. Hold <SPACEBAR> to jump higher.
Tap <A button> to jump. Hold <A button> to jump higher.
Press <SHIFT> while moving in a direction to dash. Use it in the air to reach distant places.
Press <LEFT TRIGGER> while moving in a direction to dash. Use it in the air to reach distant places.
There is no ammo left in your pistol. Touch that ammo package to pick it up.
There is no ammo left in your pistol. Touch that ammo package to pick it up.
Try to hit those targets. You can shoot with <LEFT CLICK> and reload with <R>. Use <MOUSE> to aim.
Try to hit those targets. You can shoot with <RIGHT TRIGGER> and reload with <X button>. Use <RIGHT THUMBSTICK> to aim.
Use your dagger by pressing <RIGHT CLICK>. You can receive medkits if you kill with your dagger.
Use your dagger by pressing the <RIGHT THUMBSTICK>. You can receive medkits if you kill with your dagger.
You can ignore damage while dashing. Use your dash (press <SHIFT>) to avoid being hit by the shots from the turret.
You can ignore damage while dashing. Use your dash (press <LEFT TRIGGER>) to avoid being hit by the shots from the turret.
You can heal by picking up medkits like this one.
You can heal by picking up medkits like this one.
If you have two weapons equipped, you can change weapon pressing <Q>.
If you have two weapons equipped, you can change weapon pressing <Y button>.
